content: Can anyone tell me when is the meeting/call happening for FHIR mapping for financial services. And where and how can we attend that ?

Hi @Tarun Doomra, the simplest thing to do is to find a resource of interest. Near the top of that resource is a little banner that indicates the work group responsible for that resource. If you click on that link, it'll take you to the work group's home page. Included there is a list of upcoming conference calls. It also indicates what list serve(s) exist where agendas would be posted - if the work group is in the habbit of posting agendas.
The call in in 11 minutes. Go to FreeConferenceCall.org and join call ID fm4. You can then use your laptop or a phone to call in.
@Lloyd McKenzie : if people don't have an HL7 account they can't see the call details on the HL7 Conference call site.
That sucks. Is there a reason why?
Probably - but I don't think we make it clear to people that they need to A) be logged into the site and B) that an account is free.
You lshould be able to see conference call details without being logged in. I will verify this operation with EST

@Taran Doomra: I have added draft CMS1500 and UB04 mappings to the FHIR Claim and supporting resources at: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=Financial_Management_FHIR_Resource_Development. Please let me know of needed corrections.
